snippet: NBC’s “Today” show faces dwindling popularity, perhaps because of Matt Lauer; Time Inc. employees are worried about the company’s prospects after it is spun off; and some new Spanish media outlets are trying to look on the bright side.
abstract: NBC’s “Today” show faces dwindling popularity, perhaps because of Matt Lauer; Time Inc. employees are worried about the company’s prospects after it is spun off; and some new Spanish media outlets are trying to look on the bright side.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: The 'Today' Show's Popularity Woes, and Anxiety at Time Inc.
